text:
Now that the joint training camp is about to begin,
I'm sure it's going to be a great inspiration for L'Antica

I hope we get along with the other units~
I've been looking forward to this!

Yeah, yeah!
It's a great opportunity, I have to learn a ton!

Yes, by all means,
have fun while during your training!
Leave it to me~! / Yes / Yeah / Yes! / Yes...
